Items.Title: Oversight - Next Stop: Exploring Methods of Connecting Transportation Deserts
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Next Stop: Exploring Methods of Connecting Transportation Deserts

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a citywide transit study
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to a study to be conducted by the department of transportation determining the feasibility of building a light rail system in the city of New York
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: A study to be conducted by the DOT determining the feasibility of building a light rail system in the city of NY.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the MTA to allow riders travelling within New York City limits to pay a fare for commuter rail equal to that of a MetroCard ride on New York City Transit subways and buses; and allow for free transfers between commuter rail and New York City Transit subways and buses.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: MTA to allow riders travelling within NYC City limits to pay a fare for commuter rail equal to that of a MetroCard ride on NYC Transit subways and buses.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to conduct a comprehensive study of unused and underutilized railroad rights of way in New York City for the purpose of evaluating the feasibility of increased passenger service along such corridors.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: MTA to conduct a comprehensive study of unused and underutilized railroad rights of way in NYC for the purpose of evaluating the feasibility of increased passenger service along such corridors.

Items.Title: Oversight - Next Stop: Exploring Methods of Connecting Transportation Deserts
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Next Stop: Exploring Methods of Connecting Transportation Deserts

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Crowley, Levine, Rosenthal and Treyger
